infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Nox needs camera access to let you capture and share videos of nightlife experiences, scan QR codes for venue check-in, and participate in live venue content.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Nox needs microphone access to record audio with your videos, enabling you to capture the full atmosphere of venues and events.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Nox needs photo library access to let you select photos and videos to share with your friends, and to save your captured nightlife memories.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Nox uses your contacts to help you find and connect with friends on the app. Your contacts are securely hashed and never shared publicly.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Nox uses your location to show you nearby nightlife venues, track your check-ins at venues, and display live events in your area. Location is only used while you're actively using the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Nox uses your location to show you nearby nightlife venues and track your check-ins at venues. Location data is used to enhance your nightlife discovery experience.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Nox uses your location to show you nearby nightlife venues, upcoming events in your area, and help you discover new places to go out. Location is only accessed while you're using the app.
